title: Deshaun Watson Settlement, Top RB in NFL Top 100, Protecting Justin Fields, Peter's Watch List, and NFL Preseason
itunes:title: Deshaun Watson Settlement, Top RB in NFL Top 100, Protecting Justin Fields, Peter's Watch List, and NFL Preseason
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Deshaun Watson's settlement with the NFL. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty discuss the league trying to move forward from the situation but also getting conflicting statements from the Browns.  We move onto the NFL Top 100 and wonder if Jonathan Taylor or Derrick Henry will be the top RB on the list.  The Bears got a preseason win last night, but Kyle has real concerns over the protection of QB Justin Fields. Peter gives his list of players he'll be watching for big performances from before we look at the full slate of NFL preseason games this weekend.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
